titleStmt.title: The eunuche's conuersion A sermon preached at Paules Crosse, the second of February. 1617. By Charles Sonnibank, Doctor of Diuinitie, & Canon of Windsor.
titleStmt.author: Sonibancke, Charles, 1564-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H. L[ownes] for Richard Fleming; and are to be sould at his shop at the great south doore of Paules, on the right hand going vp the shops,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the great south doore of Paules, on the right hand going vp the shops
